enabled.title: Enabled
enabled.description: If the associate is enabled for the channel.

readOnly.title: ReadOnly
readOnly.description: If the associate can edit the components contents. There can be a case where field gets it's value from the prefill service and associate is restricted to edit the field contents. In that case readOnly is kept True.

ordered.title: Ordered
ordered.description: If associate can arrange order of elements of a flowed container.
